keyFacts: The document is a contact record for an individual named Charisma Edge with the title 'ASSOCIATE WARDEN.'
The record was last updated on July 20, 2020.
It contains telephone numbers (extensions 6451 for voice/pref and work) and a unique identifier (835B5E40-11C6-0000-B3D6-FE66A7708950).
The data appears to be from a GroupWise 12.0.4 email/contact system.
The file is part of the Epstein case document set, suggesting this individual may have been associated with a correctional facility or institution relevant to the case.
